# https://docs.base.org/onchainkit/llms.txt

## OnchainKit Documentation

> OnchainKit is a React/TypeScript SDK with components, hooks, and APIs to ship beautiful onchain apps (supercharged for Base) in minutes.

## Introduction
- [Getting Started](./getting-started) — Install, scaffold, and test an OnchainKit app
- [Telemetry](./guides/telemetry) — Data collection and privacy details

## Installation
- [Next.js](./installation/nextjs) — Setup in a Next.js 14 project
- [Vite](./installation/vite) — Vite project setup

## Config
- [OnchainKitProvider](./config/onchainkit-provider) — Project-wide provider and required props
- [Supplemental Providers](./config/supplemental-providers) — Customize Wagmi/react-query providers

## Guides
- [Lifecycle Status](./guides/lifecycle-status) — Component and API lifecycle guidance
- [Testing with OnchainTestKit](./guides/testing-with-onchaintestkit) — E2E patterns for wallet and tx flows

## Templates
- [Onchain NFT App](./templates/onchain-nft-app) — Template for minting and displaying NFTs
- [Onchain Commerce App](./templates/onchain-commerce-app) — Template for checkout and payments

## Components
- [Transaction](./transaction/transaction) — Programmatic onchain actions with UI
- [Wallet](./wallet/wallet) — Wallet UI and connection patterns

## API
- [Get Swap Quote](./api/get-swap-quote) — Quoting endpoint for building swaps
- [Get Portfolios](./api/get-portfolios) — Wallet portfolio data

## Utilities
- [isBase](./config/is-base) — Chain helpers for Base
- [Format Amount](./token/format-amount) — Display utilities for tokens

## Types
- [API Types](./api/types) — Common API type definitions

## Contribution
- [Contribution Guide](./guides/contribution) — How to propose changes and report bugs

## Optional
- [AI Prompting Guide](./guides/ai-prompting-guide) — Patterns for IDEs and LLM copilots
- [Themes](./guides/themes) — Built-in themes and customization
